overview: Rainbow live at the Capitol Theatre, Passaic, New Jersey, USA - December 01, 1979  Set List:  01. Eyes of the World  02. Love's no Friend  03. Maybe Next Time  04. All Night Long  05. Lost In Hollywood (with guitar, keyboard and drum solos)  06. Lazy (short) - Man on the Silver Mountain  07. Blues  08. Long Live Rock and Roll  09. Kill The King (jam) - Long Live Rock and Roll (Reprise)
title: Rainbow - Coloring New Jersey
